response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and features, we believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase the product for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between value and affordability, aiming to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with our product.", "product_price": 12000}
